features.name: Authentication
features.description: User signup and login with role selection (Buyer/Dealer) using Supabase Auth.

features.name: Marketplace Listings
features.description: View, search, and filter bike listings. Supports city-wise filtering and sorting.

features.name: Dealer Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard for dealers to manage inventory, view leads, and check subscription status.

features.name: Lead Management
features.description: System for buyers to inquire and dealers to unlock leads using credits.

features.name: Listing Creation
features.description: Form for dealers/sellers to post new bike listings with details and images.

features.name: Billing & Credits
features.description: Razorpay integration for purchasing lead credits.
